scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test:ci
scripts.test:ci: npm run clean && npm run test:build && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:coverage: npm run coverage:test && npm run coverage:remap && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:test: npm run coverage:spec && npm run coverage:integration
scripts.coverage:integration: istanbul cover --print none -x '**/*.spec.js' -i '**/*.js'  --report lcovonly --root dist --dir coverage/integration ./scripts/run-integration.js
scripts.coverage:spec: istanbul cover --print none -x '**/*.spec.js' -i '**/*.js'  --report lcovonly --root dist  --dir coverage/spec ./scripts/run-spec.js
scripts.coverage:remap: npm run coverage:integration-remap && npm run coverage:spec-remap
scripts.coverage:report: istanbul report --dir coverage html lcov text
